00018 void ControlServer::InitInstance()
00019 {
00020     localConnectorId = 0;
00021
00022     port = 0;
00023
00024     serviceId = ComTools::GeneratePeerId();
00025     TcpServer::SetServiceId( serviceId );
00026
00027     // Change properties of my inherited faces
00028     TcpServer::SetServiceId(GetServiceId());
00029     TcpServer::SetTcpNoDelay(true);
00030     TcpServer::AddCallbackObject( this ); // Will use my XMLTreeParser side
00031
00032     // In order to check parse data
00033     // Initialise XsdValidators for :
00034     // - control query validation
00035     ControlQueryValidator.CreateSchemaFromString( ControlQueryXsdSchema );
00036 #ifdef DEBUG
00037     // - control answer validation in debug mode
00038     ControlAnswerValidator.CreateSchemaFromString( ControlAnswerXsdSchema );
00039 #endif
00040 
00041     // Give a pointer to myself on my VariableAttributeListener side
00042     VariableAttributeListener::SetUserData( this );
00043
00044     SetStatus( STATUS_INIT );
00045
00046     VariableAttribute* va = NULL;
00047
00048     va = AddVariable(CommonServiceValues::GetNameForLockString());
00049     va->SetType("integer");
00050     va->SetAccess(ReadWriteAccess);
00051     va->SetDescription("Use for locking access");
00052     lockIntVariable = new OMISCID_TLM IntVariableAttribute(va, 0);
00053
00054     va = AddVariable(CommonServiceValues::GetNameForNameString());
00055     va->SetType("string");
00056     va->SetAccess(ConstantAccess);
00057     va->SetDescription("Registered name of this service");
00058     NameVariable = new OMISCID_TLM StringVariableAttribute( va, serviceName );
00059
00060     va = AddVariable(CommonServiceValues::GetNameForOwnerString());
00061     va->SetType("string");
00062     va->SetAccess(ConstantAccess);
00063     va->SetDescription("Login which launches this service");
00064     OwnerVariable = new OMISCID_TLM StringVariableAttribute( va, "none" );
00065
00066     va = AddVariable(CommonServiceValues::GetNameForClassString());
00067     va->SetType("class");
00068     va->SetAccess(ConstantAccess);
00069     va->SetDescription("Class of this service");
00070     ClassVariable = new OMISCID_TLM StringVariableAttribute( va, CommonServiceValues::GetDefaultServiceClassName() );
00071
00072     va = AddVariable(CommonServiceValues::GetNameForPeerIdString());
00073     va->SetType("hexadecimal");
00074     va->SetAccess(ConstantAccess);
00075     va->SetDescription("PeerId of this service");
00076     PeerIdVariable = new OMISCID_TLM StringVariableAttribute( va, serviceId );
00077
00078     registerDnsSd = NULL;
00079 }
00080
00081 ControlServer::ControlServer(const SimpleString service_name)
00082 :       serviceName( service_name )
00083 {
00084     InitInstance();
00085 }
00086
00087 ControlServer::~ControlServer()
00088 {
00089     // Stop myself
00090     TcpServer::RemoveAllCallbackObjects();
00091     TcpServer::Close();
00092     XMLTreeParser::StopThread(0);
00093
00094     listValueListener.Lock();
00095     for(listValueListener.First(); listValueListener.NotAtEnd();
00096         listValueListener.Next())
00097     {
00098         delete listValueListener.GetCurrent();
00099         listValueListener.RemoveCurrent();
00100     }
00101     listValueListener.Unlock();
00102
00103     for(listVariable.First(); listVariable.NotAtEnd(); listVariable.Next())
00104     {
00105         delete listVariable.GetCurrent();
00106         listVariable.RemoveCurrent();
00107     }
00108
00109     // Remove all inoutput !
00110     for( listInOutput.First(); listInOutput.NotAtEnd(); listInOutput.Next())
00111     {
00112         delete listInOutput.GetCurrent();
00113         listInOutput.RemoveCurrent();
00114     }
00115
00116     // Destroy data
00117     if( lockIntVariable != NULL )
00118     {
00119         delete lockIntVariable;
00120         lockIntVariable = NULL;
00121     }
00122
00123     if( NameVariable != NULL )
00124     {
00125         delete NameVariable;
00126         NameVariable = NULL;
00127     }
00128
00129     if( OwnerVariable != NULL )
00130     {
00131         delete OwnerVariable;
00132         OwnerVariable = NULL;
00133     }
00134
00135     if( ClassVariable != NULL )
00136     {
00137         delete ClassVariable;
00138         ClassVariable = NULL;
00139     }
00140
00141     if ( PeerIdVariable != NULL )
00142     {
00143         delete PeerIdVariable;
00144         PeerIdVariable = NULL;
00145     }
00146
00147     if( registerDnsSd )
00148     {
00149         delete registerDnsSd;
00150         registerDnsSd = NULL;
00151     }
00152 }
00153
00154 bool ControlServer::StartServer()
00155 {
00156     if ( GetStatus() != STATUS_INIT )
00157     {
00158         // server already launch
00159         return false;
00160     }
00161
00162     try
00163     {
00164         Create(0);
00165
00166         port = GetSocket()->GetPortNb();
00167         // GetSocket()->GetHostName((char*)hostname, HOST_NAME_MAX_SIZE);
00168
00169         for(unsigned int NbMaxRegisterTries = 10; NbMaxRegisterTries > 0; NbMaxRegisterTries--)
00170         {
00171             // Add peerID value
00172             TemporaryMemoryBuffer tmp_peerid(30);       // To prevent buffer overflow
00173             snprintf( tmp_peerid, 30, "%08x", GetServiceId());
00174             PeerIdVariable->SetValue( (char*)tmp_peerid );
00175
00176             // Create an object to register the service
00177             registerDnsSd = new OMISCID_TLM RegisterOmiscidService( PeerIdVariable->GetValue(), "local.", (unsigned short)port, false);
00178
00179             // Add Constant variable
00180             // The desctiption if full by default
00181             bool TxtRecordIsFull = false;
00182             registerDnsSd->Properties["desc"] = "full"; // Will be set to part if not full
00183
00184             // Add owner value
00185             OwnerVariable->SetValue( GetLoggedUser() );
00186
00187             NameVariable->SetValue( serviceName );
00188
00189             // To prevent adding variable , inputs from another thread...
00190             SetStatus(STATUS_RUNNING);
00191
00192             SimpleString tmp;
00193
00194             // Add Constant variable
00195             for( listVariable.First(); TxtRecordIsFull != true && listVariable.NotAtEnd(); listVariable.Next() )
00196             {
00197                 if ( listVariable.GetCurrent()->GetAccess() == ConstantAccess )
00198                 {
00199                     // Compute len of the key
00200                     unsigned int TotalLenOfRecord;
00201                     TotalLenOfRecord  = listVariable.GetCurrent()->GetName().GetLength();       // Len of name
00202                     TotalLenOfRecord += 1;      // '='
00203                     TotalLenOfRecord += listVariable.GetCurrent()->GetValue().GetLength();      // len of value
00204
00205                     if ( TotalLenOfRecord > 252 )
00206                     {
00207                         // We could not set the full data in the variable
00208                         // We just say it is a variable
00209                         tmp = "c";
00210                     }
00211                     else
00212                     {
00213                         tmp = "c/";
00214                         tmp += listVariable.GetCurrent()->GetValue();
00215                     }
00216                     registerDnsSd->Properties[listVariable.GetCurrent()->GetName()] = tmp;
00217                     TxtRecordIsFull = registerDnsSd->Properties.TxtRecordIsFull();
00218                     if ( TxtRecordIsFull )
00219                     {
00220                         // undefine the last add
00221                         registerDnsSd->Properties.Undefine( listVariable.GetCurrent()->GetName() );
00222                         // Say the definition is partial
00223                         registerDnsSd->Properties["desc"] = "part";
00224                     }
00225                 }
00226             }
00227
00228             // Add inputs/outputs/inoutputs
00229             if ( TxtRecordIsFull != true )
00230             {
00231                 // Add Constant variable
00232                 for( listInOutput.First(); TxtRecordIsFull != true && listInOutput.NotAtEnd(); listInOutput.Next() )
00233                 {
00234                     ConnectorKind KindOfInOutput = listInOutput.GetCurrent()->GetType();
00235                     switch( KindOfInOutput )
00236                     {
00237                         case AnInput:
00238                             tmp = "i/";
00239                             break;
00240
00241                         case AnOutput:
00242                             tmp = "o/";
00243                             break;
00244
00245                         case AnInOutput:
00246                             tmp = "d/";
00247                             break;
00248
00249                             // to make gcc happy
00250                             // If by error, we do not have the type, we do not publish it...
00251                         case UnkownConnectorKind:
00252                             continue;
00253                     }
00254
00255                     tmp += listInOutput.GetCurrent()->GetTcpPort();
00256                     registerDnsSd->Properties[listInOutput.GetCurrent()->GetName()] = tmp;
00257                     TxtRecordIsFull = registerDnsSd->Properties.TxtRecordIsFull();
00258                     if ( TxtRecordIsFull )
00259                     {
00260                         // undefine the last add
00261                         registerDnsSd->Properties.Undefine( listInOutput.GetCurrent()->GetName() );
00262                         // Say the definition is partial
00263                         registerDnsSd->Properties["desc"] = "part";
00264                     }
00265                 }
00266             }
00267
00268             // Add non constant variable
00269             if ( TxtRecordIsFull != true )
00270             {
00271                 // Add Constant variable
00272                 for( listVariable.First(); TxtRecordIsFull != true && listVariable.NotAtEnd(); listVariable.Next() )
00273                 {
00274                     VariableAccessType VarAccess = listVariable.GetCurrent()->GetAccess();
00275                     switch( VarAccess )
00276                     {
00277                         case ReadAccess:
00278                             tmp = "r";
00279                             break;
00280
00281                         case ReadWriteAccess:
00282                             tmp = "w";
00283                             break;
00284
00285                         case ConstantAccess:
00286                             // already done
00287                             continue;
00288                     }
00289
00290                     registerDnsSd->Properties[listVariable.GetCurrent()->GetName()] = tmp;
00291                     TxtRecordIsFull = registerDnsSd->Properties.TxtRecordIsFull();
00292                     if ( TxtRecordIsFull )
00293                     {
00294                         // undefine the last add
00295                         registerDnsSd->Properties.Undefine( listVariable.GetCurrent()->GetName() );
00296                         // Say the definition is partial
00297                         registerDnsSd->Properties["desc"] = "part";
00298                     }
00299                 }
00300             }
00301
00302             // Remove Name variable from TxtRecord list, when using DNS-SD, we've got the "id" as service name
00303             registerDnsSd->Properties.Undefine( CommonServiceValues::GetNameForPeerIdString() );
00304
00305             // Actually register
00306             registerDnsSd->Register(false);
00307
00308             // Check if everything goes fine
00309             if( registerDnsSd->IsRegistered() )
00310             {
00311                 OmiscidTrace( "registered '%s' as '%s' ok\n", serviceName.GetStr(), registerDnsSd->RegisteredName.GetStr() );
00312                 // serviceName = registerDnsSd->RegisteredName;
00313                 // NameVariable->SetValue( serviceName );
00314                 StartThreadProcessMsg();
00315                 return true;
00316             }
00317
00318             // Ok, destroy the register Object
00319             delete registerDnsSd;
00320             registerDnsSd = NULL;
00321
00322             OmiscidError( "Changing PeerId from %8.8x ", serviceId );
00323
00324             // Generate a new PeerId and set it !
00325             serviceId = ComTools::GeneratePeerId();
00326             TcpServer::SetServiceId( serviceId );
00327
00328             OmiscidError( "to %8.8x because of name conflict.\n", serviceId );
00329         }
00330
00331         // Something was wrong...
00332         OmiscidError( "Registration of '%s' failed\n", serviceName.GetStr() );
00333     }
00334     catch(SocketException e)
00335     {
00336         e.Display();
00337     }
00338
00339     if ( registerDnsSd )
00340     {
00341         // Delete DNS-SD object
00342         delete registerDnsSd;
00343         registerDnsSd = NULL;
00344     }
00345
00346     // An error occurred, back to init mode
00347     SetStatus( STATUS_INIT );
00348     return false;
00349 }
00350
00351 void ControlServer::StartThreadProcessMsg()
00352 {
00353     XMLTreeParser::StartThread();
00354 }
00355
00356 void ControlServer::GenerateGlobalShortDescription(SimpleString& str)
00357 {
00358     for(listInOutput.First(); listInOutput.NotAtEnd(); listInOutput.Next())
00359     {
00360         (listInOutput.GetCurrent())->GenerateShortDescription(str);
00361     }
00362
00363     for(listVariable.First(); listVariable.NotAtEnd(); listVariable.Next())
00364     {
00365         (listVariable.GetCurrent())->GenerateShortDescription(str);
00366     }
00367 }
00368
00369 InOutputAttribute* ControlServer::FindInOutput(const SimpleString InOutputName)
00370 {
00371     for(listInOutput.First(); listInOutput.NotAtEnd(); listInOutput.Next())
00372     {
00373         if ( strcasecmp(InOutputName.GetStr(), listInOutput.GetCurrent()->GetName().GetStr() ) == 0 )
00374             return listInOutput.GetCurrent();
00375     }
00376     return NULL;
00377 }
00378
00379 VariableAttribute* ControlServer::FindVariable(const SimpleString VarName)
00380 {
00381     for(listVariable.First(); listVariable.NotAtEnd(); listVariable.Next())
00382     {
00383         if( strcasecmp( VarName.GetStr(), listVariable.GetCurrent()->GetName().GetStr() ) == 0 )
00384             return listVariable.GetCurrent();
00385     }
00386     return NULL;
00387 }
00388
00389 void ControlServer::ProcessAMessage(XMLMessage* msg)
00390 {
00391     // OmiscidTrace( "in ControlServer::ProcessAMessage\n");
00392     // OmiscidTrace( "from pid = %u \n",msg->pid);
00393
00394     if ( msg == NULL )
00395     {
00396         // Nothing to do
00397         return;
00398     }
00399
00400     xmlNodePtr node = msg->GetRootNode();
00401
00402     // if( strcmp((const char*)node->name, "controlQuery") == 0 )
00403     if ( ControlQueryValidator.ValidateDoc(msg->doc) )
00404     {
00405         SimpleString id;
00406         xmlAttrPtr attr = XMLMessage::FindAttribute("id", node);
00407         if(attr)
00408         { id = SimpleString((const char*)attr->children->content);}
00409
00410         bool ReplyAnAnswer = true;      // default
00411         SimpleString str;
00412
00413         if(node->children == NULL)
00414         {
00415             //global description
00416             GenerateGlobalShortDescription(str);
00417         }
00418         else
00419         {
00420             // more precise request
00421             xmlNodePtr cur_node = node->children;
00422             for(; cur_node; cur_node = cur_node->next)
00423             {
00424                 SimpleString name = (const char*)(cur_node->name);
00425                 //std::cerr << "tag name="<<(*it)->name <<"\n";
00426                 if( name == InOutputAttribute::input_str.GetStr() ||
00427                     name == InOutputAttribute::output_str.GetStr() ||
00428                     name == InOutputAttribute::inoutput_str.GetStr() )
00429                 {
00430                     // OmiscidTrace( " process io : %s \n", (*it)->name.GetStr());
00431                     ProcessInOutputQuery(cur_node, str);
00432                 }
00433                 else if( name == VariableAttribute::variable_str.GetStr() )
00434                 {
00435                     ProcessVariableQuery(cur_node, msg->pid,  str);
00436                 }
00437                 else if( name == "connect" )
00438                 {
00439                     ProcessConnectQuery(cur_node, str);
00440                 }
00441                 else if( name == "subscribe" )
00442                 {
00443                     ProcessSubscribeQuery(cur_node, msg->pid, true, str);
00444                 }
00445                 else if( name == "unsubscribe" )
00446                 {
00447                     ReplyAnAnswer = false;
00448                     ProcessSubscribeQuery(cur_node, msg->pid, false, str);
00449                 }
00450                 else if( name == "lock" )
00451                 {
00452                     ProcessLockQuery(cur_node, msg->pid, true, str);
00453                 }
00454                 else if( name == "unlock" )
00455                 {
00456                     ProcessLockQuery(cur_node, msg->pid, false, str);
00457                 }
00458                 else if( name == "fullDescription" )
00459                 {
00460                     ProcessFullDescriptionQuery(cur_node, str);
00461                 }
00462                 else
00463                 {
00464                     // Should not appear
00465                     OmiscidError( "unknown tag : %s\n", name.GetStr() );
00466                 }
00467             }
00468             // OmiscidError( "Send : %s \n", str.GetStr());
00469         }
00470
00471         if ( ReplyAnAnswer == true )
00472         {
00473             str = "<controlAnswer id=\""+id+"\">"
00474                 + str
00475                 + "</controlAnswer>";
00476
00477     #ifdef DEBUG
00478             if ( ControlAnswerValidator.ValidateDoc( str ) == false )
00479             {
00480                 OmiscidError( "ControlServer::ProcessAMessage: bad ControlAnswer sent.\n" );
00481             }
00482     #endif
00483 
00484             TcpServer::listConnections.Lock();
00485             MsgSocket* ms = FindClientFromId( msg->pid );
00486             if( ms )
00487             {
00488                 try
00489                 {
00490                     ms->Send((int)str.GetLength(), str.GetStr());
00491                 }
00492                 catch( SocketException& e )
00493                 {
00494                     OmiscidError( "Error when responding to a client request : %s (%d)\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00495                 }
00496             }
00497             TcpServer::listConnections.Unlock();
00498         }
00499     }
00500     else
00501     {
00502         OmiscidError( "waited : controlQuery, received='%s'\n", node->name);
00503     }
00504 }
00505
00506 void ControlServer::ProcessInOutputQuery(xmlNodePtr node, SimpleString& str_answer)
00507 {
00508     if(node->children != NULL)
00509     {
00510         OmiscidError( "unknown inoutput query (unwaited child)\n");
00511     }
00512     else
00513     {
00514         xmlAttrPtr attr = XMLMessage::FindAttribute("name", node);
00515         bool found = (attr != NULL);
00516         if(found)
00517         {
00518             SimpleString name((const char*)attr->children->content);
00519             InOutputAttribute* ioa = FindInOutput(name);
00520             if(ioa)
00521             {
00522                 ioa->GenerateLongDescription(str_answer);
00523             }
00524         }
00525         else
00526         {
00527             OmiscidTrace( "understood query (name requested)\n");
00528         }
00529     }
00530 }
00531
00532 void ControlServer::ProcessVariableQuery(xmlNodePtr node, unsigned int pid, SimpleString& str_answer)
00533 {
00534     //std::cerr<<"in processVariable\n";
00535     xmlAttrPtr attr = XMLMessage::FindAttribute("name", node);
00536     bool found = (attr != NULL);
00537
00538     if ( found )
00539     {
00540         SimpleString name((const char*)attr->children->content);
00541         VariableAttribute* va = FindVariable(name);
00542
00543         // OmiscidTrace( "Query on name '%s' in %8.8x\n", name.GetStr(), GetServiceId() );
00544
00545         if(va)
00546         {
00547             if(node->children == NULL)
00548             {
00549                 // OmiscidTrace( "GenerateLongDescription\n" );
00550                 va->GenerateLongDescription(str_answer);
00551             }
00552             else
00553             {
00554                 // OmiscidTrace( "VariableChange\n" );
00555                 xmlNodePtr val_node = XMLMessage::FindFirstChild("value", node);
00556                 if(val_node)
00557                 {
00558                     if(LockOk(pid) && va->CanBeModifiedFromOutside(GetStatus()))
00559                     {
00560                         //if(va->GetType() == "xml")
00561                         //{
00562                         //      // SimpleString val_modif((const char*)val_node->children->content);
00563                         //      // VariableAttribute::ModifXmlInStrRevert(val_modif);
00564                         //      VariableChange( va, (const char*)val_node->children->content, GetStatus() );
00565                         //}
00566                         //else
00567                         //{
00568                         //      VariableChange( va, (const char*)val_node->children->content, GetStatus() );
00569                         //}
00570
00571                         // Check if variable value is empty or not
00572                         if ( val_node->children == NULL )
00573                         {
00574                             VariableChange( va, (const char*)NULL, GetStatus() );
00575                         }
00576                         else
00577                         {
00578                             VariableChange( va, (const char*)val_node->children->content, GetStatus() );
00579                         }
00580                     }
00581                     va->GenerateLongDescription(str_answer);
00582                 }
00583             }
00584         }
00585     }
00586     else
00587     {
00588         OmiscidTrace( "understood query (name requested)\n");
00589     }
00590 }
00591
00592 void ControlServer::ProcessConnectQuery(xmlNodePtr node, SimpleString& str_answer)
00593 {
00594     //std::cerr << "connect query : not yet implemented\n";
00595     xmlAttrPtr attr = XMLMessage::FindAttribute("name", node);
00596     bool found = (attr != NULL);
00597     if( found )
00598     {
00599         SimpleString name((const char*)attr->children->content);
00600         InOutputAttribute* ioa = FindInOutput(name);
00601         if(ioa)
00602         {
00603             bool found_host = false;
00604             bool found_port = false;
00605             bool tcp = true;
00606             int port = 0;
00607             SimpleString host;
00608
00609             xmlNodePtr cur_node = node->children;
00610             for(; cur_node; cur_node = cur_node->next)
00611             {
00612                 const char* nodename = (const char*)(cur_node->name);
00613                 if(strcmp(nodename, "host") == 0)
00614                 {
00615                     host = SimpleString((const char*)cur_node->children->content);
00616                     found_host = true;
00617                 }
00618                 else if((strcmp(nodename,"tcp") == 0) || (strcmp(nodename,"udp")==0) )
00619                 {
00620                     tcp = (strcmp(nodename, "tcp") == 0);
00621                     found_port = true;
00622                     port = atoi((const char*)(cur_node->children->content));
00623                 }
00624                 else
00625                 {
00626                     OmiscidError( "in connect query : unused tag :\n");
00627 #if defined DEBUG
00628                     XMLMessage::DisplayNode(cur_node, stderr);
00629 #endif
00630                 }
00631             }
00632             if(found_port && found_host)
00633             {
00634                 Connect(host, port, tcp, ioa);
00635                 ioa->GenerateConnectAnswer(str_answer);
00636             }
00637         }
00638     }
00639     else
00640     {
00641         OmiscidTrace( "understood query (name requested)\n");
00642     }
00643 }
00644 void ControlServer::ProcessSubscribeQuery(xmlNodePtr node, unsigned peer_id, bool subscribe, SimpleString& str_answer)
00645 {
00646     //std::cerr << "connect query : not yet implemented\n";
00647     xmlAttrPtr attr = XMLMessage::FindAttribute("name", node);
00648     bool found = (attr != NULL);
00649     if(!found)
00650     {
00651         OmiscidTrace( "understood query (name requested)\n");
00652     }
00653     else
00654     {
00655         SimpleString name((const char*)attr->children->content);
00656         VariableAttribute* va = FindVariable(name);
00657         if( va )
00658         {
00659             if (subscribe)
00660             {
00661                 AddListener(va, peer_id);
00662                 va->GenerateLongDescription( str_answer );
00663             }
00664             else
00665             {
00666                 RemoveListener(va, peer_id);
00667             }
00668         }
00669     }
00670 }
00671
00672 void ControlServer::ProcessLockQuery(xmlNodePtr node, unsigned int pid, bool lock, SimpleString& str_answer)
00673 {
00674     SimpleString result = "<";
00675     if(lock)
00676     {
00677         result += "lock result=\"";
00678         if(LockOk(pid)){
00679             lockIntVariable->SetValue((int)pid);
00680             result+="ok";
00681         }else{
00682             result += "failed";
00683         }
00684     }
00685     else
00686     {
00687         result += "unlock result=\"";
00688         if(LockOk(pid)){
00689             result+="ok";
00690             lockIntVariable->SetValue(0);
00691         }else{
00692             result += "failed";
00693         }
00694     }
00695
00696     TemporaryMemoryBuffer tmp_peerid(10);
00697     snprintf(tmp_peerid, 10, "%08x",  (unsigned int)lockIntVariable->GetValue());
00698     result += "\" peer=\"";
00699     result += tmp_peerid;
00700     result += "\"/>";
00701
00702     str_answer += result;
00703 }
00704
00705 void ControlServer::ProcessFullDescriptionQuery(xmlNodePtr node, SimpleString& str_answer)
00706 {
00707     // Add InOutput description
00708     for( listInOutput.First(); listInOutput.NotAtEnd(); listInOutput.Next() )
00709     {
00710         listInOutput.GetCurrent()->GenerateLongDescription(str_answer);
00711     }
00712
00713     // Add variable description
00714     for( listVariable.First(); listVariable.NotAtEnd(); listVariable.Next() )
00715     {
00716         listVariable.GetCurrent()->GenerateLongDescription(str_answer);
00717     }
00718 }
00719
00720 bool ControlServer::LockOk(unsigned int peer){
00721     RefreshLock();
00722     return (lockIntVariable->GetValue() == 0) || (((unsigned int)lockIntVariable->GetValue()) == peer);
00723 }
00724
00725 void ControlServer::RefreshLock(){
00726     unsigned int peer = (unsigned int)lockIntVariable->GetValue();
00727     if(peer != 0){
00728         if(!IsStillConnected(peer)){
00729             lockIntVariable->SetValue(0);
00730         }
00731     }
00732 }
00733
00734 void ControlServer::Connect(const SimpleString host, int port, bool tcp, InOutputAttribute* ioa)
00735 {
00736 #ifdef DEBUG
00737     fprintf(stderr, "in ControlServer::Connect (%s:%d", host.GetStr(), port);
00738     if(tcp) fprintf(stderr, " [TCP] "); else fprintf(stderr, " [UDP] ");
00739     fprintf(stderr, "%s\n", ioa->GetName().GetStr());
00740 #endif
00741 }
00742
00743 void ControlServer::VariableChange( VariableAttribute* va, SimpleString NewValue, ControlServerStatus status )
00744 {
00745     OmiscidTrace( "ControlServer::VariableChange '%s' New Value='%s'\n", va->GetName().GetStr(), NewValue.GetStr());
00746     // Do what we must do...
00747
00748     // va will call back me to know if I agree to change it's value
00749     // va will also notify me that the value has changed (if change have been validated)
00750     va->SetValue( NewValue );
00751 }
00752
00753 bool ControlServer::IsValid( VariableAttribute * ChangedVariable, SimpleString newValue )
00754 {
00755     // OIutside check is done when receiving external modification is asked
00756     return ChangedVariable->CanBeModifiedFromInside(GetStatus());
00757 }
00758
00759 void ControlServer::VariableChanged( VariableAttribute * ChangedVariable )
00760 {
00761     if ( Status == STATUS_RUNNING )
00762     {
00763         NotifyValueChanged( ChangedVariable );
00764     }
00765 }
00766
00767 VariableAttribute* ControlServer::AddVariable(const SimpleString VarName)
00768 {
00769     if ( GetStatus() == STATUS_RUNNING || VarName.IsEmpty() )
00770     {
00771         return NULL;
00772     }
00773
00774     // Look for a Varible of an Input with the same name
00775     if ( FindVariable( VarName ) != NULL )
00776     {
00777         // Already exists
00778         OmiscidError( "A variable with the same name already exists.\n" );
00779         return NULL;
00780     }
00781
00782     // Look for a Varible of an Input with the same name
00783     if ( FindInOutput( VarName ) != NULL )
00784     {
00785         // Already exists
00786         OmiscidError( "A connector with the same name already exists. Could not add variable.\n" );
00787         return NULL;
00788     }
00789
00790     VariableAttribute* va = new OMISCID_TLM VariableAttribute(VarName);
00791     listVariable.Add(va);
00792
00793     // I am the first listener
00794     va->AddListener( this );
00795
00796     return va;
00797 }
00798
00799 InOutputAttribute* ControlServer::AddInOutput(const SimpleString InOutputName, ComTools* com_tool, ConnectorKind kind_of_input)
00800 {
00801     if ( GetStatus() == STATUS_RUNNING || InOutputName.IsEmpty() )
00802     {
00803         return NULL;
00804     }
00805
00806     // Look for a Varible of an Input with the same name
00807     if ( FindInOutput( InOutputName ) != NULL )
00808     {
00809         // Already exists
00810         OmiscidError( "A connector with the same name already exists.\n" );
00811         return NULL;
00812     }
00813
00814     // Look for a Varible of an Input with the same name
00815     if ( FindVariable( InOutputName ) != NULL )
00816     {
00817         // Already exists
00818         OmiscidError( "A variable with the same name already exists. Could not add connector.\n" );
00819         return NULL;
00820     }
00821
00822     // Add the connector
00823     unsigned int ConnectorId;
00824
00825     InOutputAttribute* ioa = new OMISCID_TLM InOutputAttribute(InOutputName, com_tool, kind_of_input);
00826     if ( com_tool )
00827     {
00828         // Incr number for the Connector
00829         localConnectorId++;
00830         if ( (localConnectorId & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID) != 0 )
00831         {
00832             fprintf( stderr, "Too many connector (>127). Unexpected features may appear\n." );
00833         }
00834
00835         ConnectorId = localConnectorId & ComTools::CONNECTOR_ID;
00836
00837         com_tool->SetServiceId( GetServiceId() | ConnectorId );
00838     }
00839
00840     listInOutput.Add(ioa);
00841
00842     return ioa;
00843 }
00844
00846
00847 void ControlServer::NotifyValueChanged(VariableAttribute* var)
00848 {
00849     listValueListener.Lock();
00850     ValueListener* vl = FindValueListener(var);
00851     if(vl && vl->HasListener())
00852     {
00853         SimpleString str("<variable name=\"");
00854         str = str + var->GetName()+"\"><value>"+ var->GetValue()+"</value></variable>";
00855         str = "<controlEvent>" + str + "</controlEvent>";
00856
00857 #ifdef DEBUG
00858         // Validate against XSD schema
00859         if ( ControlAnswerValidator.ValidateDoc( str ) == false )
00860         {
00861             // bad message...
00862             OmiscidError( "ControlServer::NotifyValueChanged: bad controlEvent sent.\n" );
00863             return;
00864         }
00865 #endif
00866 
00867         for(vl->listListener.First(); vl->listListener.NotAtEnd(); vl->listListener.Next())
00868         {
00869             listConnections.Lock();
00870             MsgSocket* sock = FindClientFromId(vl->listListener.GetCurrent());
00871             if( sock )
00872             {
00873                 try
00874                 {
00875                     sock->Send(str.GetLength(), str.GetStr());
00876                 }
00877                 catch( SocketException& e )
00878                 {
00879                     OmiscidTrace( "Error notification of value changes : %s (%d)\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00880                 }
00881             }
00882             else
00883             {
00884                 vl->listListener.RemoveCurrent();
00885             }
00886             listConnections.Unlock();
00887         }
00888     }
00889     listValueListener.Unlock();
00890 }
00891
00892
00893 void ControlServer::AddListener(VariableAttribute* var, unsigned listener_id)
00894 {
00895     listValueListener.Lock();
00896     ValueListener* vl = FindValueListener(var);
00897     if(vl) vl->AddListener(listener_id);
00898     else
00899     {
00900         listValueListener.Add(new ValueListener(var, listener_id));
00901     }
00902     listValueListener.Unlock();
00903 }
00904
00905 void ControlServer::RemoveListener(VariableAttribute* var, unsigned int pid)
00906 {
00907     listValueListener.Lock();
00908     if(var)
00909     {
00910         ValueListener* vl = FindValueListener(var);
00911         if(vl) vl->RemoveListener(pid);
00912     }
00913     else
00914     {
00915         for(listValueListener.First(); listValueListener.NotAtEnd();
00916             listValueListener.Next())
00917             (listValueListener.GetCurrent())->RemoveListener(pid);
00918     }
00919     listValueListener.Unlock();
00920 }
00921
00922 ValueListener* ControlServer::FindValueListener(VariableAttribute* var)
00923 {
00924     ValueListener* vl = NULL;
00925
00926     for(listValueListener.First();
00927         vl == NULL && listValueListener.NotAtEnd(); listValueListener.Next())
00928     {
00929         if((listValueListener.GetCurrent())->var == var)
00930             vl = listValueListener.GetCurrent();
00931     }
00932     return vl;
00933 }
00934
00936 ValueListener::ValueListener(VariableAttribute* v, unsigned int pid)
00937 {
00938     var = v;
00939     AddListener(pid);
00940 }
00941
00942 ValueListener::~ValueListener()
00943 {
00944     var = NULL;
00945     listListener.Empty();
00946 }
00947
00948 void ValueListener::AddListener(unsigned int listener_id)
00949 {
00950     OmiscidTrace( "addListener  %s %u\n", var->GetName().GetStr(), listener_id);
00951     listListener.Add(listener_id);
00952 }
00953
00954 void ValueListener::RemoveListener(unsigned int listener_id)
00955 {
00956     listListener.Remove(listener_id);
00957 }
00958
00959 bool ValueListener::HasListener() const
00960 {
00961     return listListener.GetNumberOfElements() != 0;
00962 }

00974 bool ControlServer::SetServiceName(const SimpleString service_name)

00976     if ( registerDnsSd && registerDnsSd->IsRegistered() )
00977     {
00978         return false;
00979     }
00980
00981     serviceName = service_name;
00982     return true;
00983 }
